page.title: 13RECREATION PART 2.
page.content: {DO YOU BELONG TO A LIBRARY? 64% belonged to a library. 39% used the travelling library. 25% used libraries outside the village. {DO YOU WATCH TELEVISION? 96% of the people watched T.V. 37% for up to 10 hours per week. 35% between 10 and 20 hours per week. 16% between 20 and 30 huors per week. 7% for more than 30 huors per week. {OTHER LEISURE ACTIVITIES. 20% of the sample enjoyed gardening.Other popular leisure per suits included walking,camping,wine making,photography and various types of collecting. It appears that many people have to go out of the village for their sporting activities.The Village Club is well supported.Over half the sample used a library.T.V.is very popular.
